text:
These Three Characters Will Most Likely Meet Their End In Game Of Thrones Season 8 Episode 3
These Three Characters Will Most Likely Meet Their End In Game Of Thrones Season 8 Episode 3
While the entire nation is basking in the glory of the epic movie that Avengers: Endgame was, we all sort of forgot about Game Of Thrones, didn’t we?
In Game of Thrones episode 2 of the show which will soon come to an end was perhaps the last time we saw all the characters alive and together. The battle will begin soon, and our favourite characters will meet their end.
People have been speculating as to who will die first in this finale season. Some fans have even prepared a list, which is quite viral on social media.
Twitter
But, when the winter finally arrives in Winterfell, some of the key characters will die. Among the characters in dangers, these ones will likely breathe their last in Game of Thrones season 8 episode 3.
Don't Miss 246 SHARES 1.9 K SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES
You know the drill, right? The information below could be potential Game of Thrones season 8 episode 3 spoilers. Scroll down at your own risk.
#1 Theon Greyjoy
As per bets on Sportsbetting.ag, which is online sports betting site, chances of Theon Greyjoy dying in episode 3 are the highest. Bets put 4-to-1 odds on him dying first.
#2 Jaime Lannister
Popular theories might suggest that Jaime Lannister will kill Cersei, but according to Sportsbetting.ag, odds on Jaime dying first are 5-to-1.
#3 Brienne of Tarth
Brienne of Tarth, who recently became the first woman knight of the show’s Seven Kingdoms, fetches 12-to-1 odds on dying first.
Also Read: This Baby Dressed Up As Brienne Of Tarth To Welcome Game Of Thrones Season 8 & We Can’t Stop Swooning
Who do you think will die first in Game Of Thrones season 8 episode 3? Meanwhile, do you know that this episode will be 82 minutes long, and that it took 55 nights to film the episode. It will mark the beginning of the bloodiest finale battle at the Winterfell. Are you all ready?
Also Read: Blood Bath Is About To Begin & These Latest Pics Of Game Of Thrones Show Jon Snow Is Terrified!
With inputs from Reuters
